article: generale unk , a ### percent owned subsidiary of french group alcatel-alsthom , will convey all of its holdings in publishing and the written press to havas subsidiary unk , it was announced here on wednesday by havas chairman pierre unk and alcatel-alsthom chief serge tchuruk .
abstract: havas unit to take over all generale unk stake in publishing
